${modID}:BrokenAlarm.NAME: Broken Alarm
${modID}:BrokenAlarm.FLAVOR: You've tried everything, but the beeping just wont stop.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply 1 Insomnia to all enemies.

${modID}:DreamJournal.NAME: Dream Journal
${modID}:DreamJournal.FLAVOR: I've been meaning to keep one of these for ages!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, Awaken 1 card.

${modID}:EyeMask.NAME: Eye Mask
${modID}:EyeMask.FLAVOR: At last, total darkness... and a light flickering in the far distance.

${modID}:GoodJobSticker.NAME: Good Job Sticker
${modID}:GoodJobSticker.FLAVOR: Its yellow shine inspires you to dig deep.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you Awaken a card, upgrade it until the end of combat.

${modID}:IncenseHolder.NAME: Incense Holder
${modID}:IncenseHolder.FLAVOR: The odour pouring from this seems to help dispel bad dreams.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play an unplayable card from forgotten, exhaust it and gain one energy.

${modID}:LavaLamp.NAME: Lava Lamp
${modID}:LavaLamp.FLAVOR: Staring too long at the globs of light gives you a headache.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply Insomnia to an enemy, apply 1 more Insomnia.

${modID}:SleepingMouse.NAME: Sleeping Mouse
${modID}:SleepingMouse.FLAVOR: She seems completely impervious to the horrors around her.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you Awaken a card, gain 3 block.

${modID}:SleepMobile.NAME: Sleep Mobile
${modID}:SleepMobile.FLAVOR: Looking at it gives you an odd sense of deja vu.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you remember a power card, shuffle a copy of that card into your deck.

${modID}:StickerNote.NAME: Sticker Note
${modID}:StickerNote.FLAVOR: Funny.... it's your handwriting, but you don't remember writing it.
DESCRIPTIONS: You may play non-Urgent cards even when you have an Urgent card in your hand. When you do, lose 1HP for every Urgent card in your hand.

${modID}:TeddyBear.NAME: Fluffy the Bear
${modID}:TeddyBear.FLAVOR: Fluffy? How did you get into my dream?
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with three cards in your deck Forgotten.

${modID}:WideEyedDoll.NAME: Wide-Eyed Doll
${modID}:WideEyedDoll.FLAVOR: Where's Fluffy? ...Was this there when I went to sleep?
DESCRIPTIONS: (TESTING) Replaces Fluffy the Bear. NL Cards remain Forgotten between combats.
